text:
The University of Texas at El Paso
Texas Western College
Department of Mass Communication
Dec, 12,
Mr. Jerrold Sandler
National Educational Radio
13U6 Connecticut Ave. N.W.
Washington, D. C, 20036
Dear Mr, Sandler:
We have mailed the required fourteen
copies of the enclosed comment on the
proposed 10 watt PM regulation.
I have no idea what stand the
N.E.R. is taking on this matter, but
it surely would be in our best interest
if things remained as they are.
Sincerely,
VCH:slm
Enclosure
Virgil C. Hicks
Head (Broadcasting)
Dept, of Mass Communication
